name: Hilton Head Flight Training
about: Hilton Head Flight Training, located on the scenic Hilton Head Island in South Carolina, offers expert flight instruction with a focus on safety and excellence. Led by FAA Instructor Chuck Copley, who brings over 35 years of experience, the school provides a comprehensive learning environment. Students have the opportunity to train in a Piper Warrior PA-28-161 aircraft, equipped with advanced avionics such as a Garmin 430 and 696. The school's picturesque location allows for unique and enjoyable flight training experiences. With a commitment to personalized instruction and a passion for aviation, Hilton Head Flight Training is an ideal choice for aspiring pilots looking to achieve their flying goals.
